ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Solar Wind and Suprathermal Ion Composition Experiment (SMS)
ResourceHeader.Description: The Wind SMS instrument suite is composed of three separate instruments. The SupraThermal Ion Composition Spectrometer (STICS) determines the mass, mass per charge, and energy for ions in the energy range of 6-230 keV/e. The high resolution mass spectrometer (MASS) determines elemental and isotopic abundances from 0.5 to 12 keV/e. Finally, The Solar Wind Ion Composition Spectrometer (SWICS) determines mass, charge, and energy for ions in the energy range of 0.5 to 30 keV/e. The SWICS "stop" MCP experienced a failure resulting in reduced capabilities for this instrument.
